discursos.dicho: The National Crusade Against Hunger has proven to be an effective strategy to combat extreme poverty and hunger. CONEVAL confirmed so in its Intermediate Results of the National Crusade Against Hunger report.
discursos.fuente: Third State of the State Address
discursos.hecho: The report cited by the President is not so optimist. While the exploratory impact study of the Crusade indicates an effect in reducing extreme poverty, there is no evidence that it has any effect in reducing malnourishment (hunger).

discursos.dicho: If we are talking about a Crusade against hunger and a 100% of that population is malnourished, today only 42% of that population is malnourished. We diminished that problem in 57.5%.
discursos.hecho: Between 2012 and 2014, the population in extreme poverty that also is malnourished, which is the target population of the Crusade, increased in over 132,000 people according to CONEVAL.

discursos.dicho: its true that extreme poverty has been eradicated, but it is also true that moderate poverty has increased.
discursos.fuente: Second Plenary Meeting of the PRI and PVEM political parties Parlamentary Group of the LXIII Lower Chamber of Congress
discursos.hecho: The lastest data from CONEVAL indicates that extreme poverty has not been eradicated, in 2014 there were still 11 million people living in such condition.
